title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text content type does not have any effect on the report results. Regardless of whether I set the content type to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report displays the same results.
EB:
The expected results are as follows:
- For the Plain content type, I expect the literal content (including tags) to be displayed.
- For the Auto content type, I expect all three contents (1, 2, and 3) to appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags.
- For the HTML content type, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.

Please refer to the attached report for more details.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the report in the software.
2. Set a dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML.
3. Observe that the report always displays the same results, regardless of the selected content type.
